entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as a tyrant who created his worst enemy. He is also mentioned to have heard a prophecy and leapt into action.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as standing up and striding about the room in glittering robes.

relationships.description: Voldemort created his worst enemy, Harry. This relationship is described as tyrants everywhere do.
Voldemort handed Harry uniquely deadly weapons.
